Question: This person had learned McCartney made approximately $40 million a year from other people's songs.
Hints: This person was inducted onto the Hollywood Walk of Fame in 1980 as member of The ____s and in 1984 as solo artist.
This person's music took root in R&B, pop and soul.
Throughout 2000 and 2001, this person worked in the studio with Teddy Riley and Rodney Jerkins, as well as other collaborators.
